Package view

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    CardsConsole
    this class creates the cards view on main game window
    ControlsConsole
    class containing methods for all controls in reinforcement and fortification phase
    DiceRollConsole
    class creates the dice-roll VIEW on Main-Game-Window
    DominationConsole
    This class will implement the domination by different players in the world.
    ExistingMapModifier
    class opens the JFrame view for delete/add country and continent while modifying Map
    FrameForMap
    The class FrameForMap opens JFrame view for selecting either a New map or an Existing map.
    GameConsole
    This class is the main view of the front end of the game console where the players will play the game and all other information while playing the game will be displayed.
    MapConsole
    This class provides the view of the map on the main window class
    MapExist
    This class opens jFrame to open map file
    MapSelection
    This class is implementing map file selection
    NewMapCreation
    This class opens the view for addition and deletion of continents and countries while creating new map
    openingdialog
    This class is from where the game starts 1.
    PhaseConsole
    Implements the Phase View panel of the main window using Observer Pattern.
    PlayerConsole
    This class displays the player view on main window
    ResultConsole  
    TournamentConsole
    This class defines a menu for game for tournament-mode after entering specific information for Tournament mode only maximum of 4 players can play
    TournamentModeMenu
    This class provides a menu to go for tournament mode by providing the info asked for Tournament mode maximum 4 players can play
